id: scenario-autonomous-entity-customer-scenarios-community-customer learns about supply chain connecting to bioregional food system
title: Customer learns about supply chain connecting to bioregional food system
description: Customer learns about supply chain connecting to bioregional food system
content:
Scenario: Customer learns about supply chain connecting to bioregional food system
    Given corporate food is anonymous commodity obscuring agricultural connections
    And Ms. Johnson never thought about where her food came from
    When democratic transparency reveals supply chain relationships
    Then she learns about Johnson Farm and Tom's regenerative agriculture
    And understands her consumption supports farmworkers earning living wages
    And sees how democratic food system operates bioregionally
    And consumption connects her to land, ecology, and agricultural labor
    And community_elohim provides educational supply chain storytelling
